summary: With a 20 year lease on an tropical island, horny John heads out with Fiona on a yacht skippered by horny Larry, to inspect the island for resort development. They meet Luna/Laura Gemser. John didn't expect zombies.
cast: Laura Gemser|George Eastman|Dirce Funari|Mark Shannon|Chantal Kubel|Lucia Ramirez
